main.name: David William Rigamonte
main.bio: Hi, I'm David. I am enthusiastic for information technology, and problem solving.
main.contactmessage: Please feel free to contact me.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: In my graduation I had the opportunity to delve into several issues that set up my base to start a career: Object Orientation, interaction design, design patterns, project management, operations research, java development and c ++, database, operating systems, business modeling, economics, computer networks, among others. ESCOLA DE TI (IT School). In the final exam, my team and I (8 members) developed a full web application with back-end and front-end on Java Spring MVC for a Non-governmental organization for blind people. In addition to the programmer function I exercised the scrum master function for much of the time.

work.title: Full Stack Software Developer
work.description: Now working at a product called PlugNotas, a modern API, handling a millions of JSON requests in back-end, asyncronous processing, webhooks and using the best practices. Developing a lot of micro services from zero to full deployed on AWS using Elastic Container Services.
